resources.string: Tap anywhere to open a photo

Choose the maximum image size for export and sharing. The given sizes refer to the long edge of the image (for example, to the width for the landscape images) and would only apply to images larger than the selected value. Smaller images will not be enlarged.
Choose the format and quality rate that will be applied whilst exporting or sharing images. JPG 100% will give the best jpeg-image at the cost of increased file size.
